itunes:title: Episode 618 - Special Guest Former Green Beret Joe Kent
title: Episode 618 - Special Guest Former Green Beret Joe Kent
itunes:author: Tetherball Academy Media
itunes:subtitle: Ross Patterson and Dan Hollaway welcome special guest Joe Kent, husband of fallen navy cryptologist Shannon Kent to discuss his wife’s important work in gathering intelligence that led to the killing and capture of over 400 terrorist operatives, how he i...
itunes:summary:
Ross Patterson and Dan Hollaway welcome special guest Joe Kent, husband of fallen navy cryptologist Shannon Kent to discuss his wife’s important work in gathering intelligence that led to the killing and capture of over 400 terrorist operatives, how he is gearing up for development of a movie to portray Shannon’s story, Dan and Joe review how Donald Trump turned the Republican party around to become a more efficient and productive establishment, and the 3 end the show with weighing in on presidential nominees Joe Biden and Donald Trump.

ghostbed.com/drinkinbros
